name: Slack Factory
description:
A simple prototype for my first jam, the 1-Button Jam 2022 .

You have to fill the containers with the right amount of cereals. (there is a tolerance of +20/-20)

Control:

Press the spacebar or the red button in game to push the cereals through the nozzle.

I used few materials from 3D TEXTURES and a few SFX from 200 Free SFX by Kronbits

Music :

Bread (Prod. by Lukrembo)

Tools:

Unity

iTween
